content: planter coaster a crochet pattern by hanne voittonen plantercoaster directions planter coaster is a quick and simple crochet make a slip knot to start your work chain 5 project it uses half_double_crochet stitches and join into a loop using a slip_stitch the coaster is finished with a slip_stitch edge round 1 chain 2 crochet 9hdc into the loop finished measurements 5 3 13 5 cm 10 sts the turning chain of 2 sts counts as a sts materials round 2 ch2 *2hdc blo into each sts* 20 sts in total hook us c-2 2 5 mm round 3 ch2 *2hdc blo into the same sts 1hdc blo into next sts* yarn round 4 ch2 *2hdc blo 2hdc blo into the same dk weight 100 % cotton yarn pirkka-puuvilla sts* 40 sts or similar with matching yardage 137 yards 125 meters in 1 76 oz 50 grams round 5 ch2 *2hdc blo into the same sts 3hdc blo* yarn amount 0 42 oz 12 grams 30 0 meters 32 8 yards round 6 ch2 *4hdc blo 2hdc blo into the same sts* 60 sts notions tapestry needle round 7 ch2 *2hdc blo into the same sts 5hdc blo* abbreviations&patternnotes round 8 ch2 *6hdc blo 2hdc blo into the same sts* 80 sts this pattern uses us crochet terminology round 9 ch2 *2hdc blo into the same sts 7hdc chain chain blo* blo back loop only round 10 ch2 *8hdc blo 2hdc blo into the same sts* half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in this pattern each half_double_crochet is done to the back loop crocheting round 11 slip_stitch to the end of the round through the back loop creates ridges of texture to the fabric for your planter to sit snuggly on break yarn and weave in the yarn ends make a half_double_crochet stitch as follows 1 yarn over and insert the hook into the back leg of the next stitch 2 yarn over and pull up a loop 3 yarn over and pull the yarn through all three loops on your hook note also that in this pattern a turning chain of two sts at the beginning of each round counts as a sts when creating half_double_crochet skip the first sts of this chain and make the first half_double_crochet into the second sts make the last stitch of the round into the top of the turning chain from the previous round slip_stitch slip sts st sts stitch stitches round round row © hanne voittonen 2025 | planter
